FuncDef: Associates a Quality of Service (QoS) policy with an ingress Service Access Point (SAP) or IP interface.

ParaDef.Info: The ingress policy ID to associate with SAP or IP interface on ingress. The policy ID must already exist. Values-1 to 65535.

This keyword can only be specified on SAP ingress. Specify the ingress shared queue policy used by a SAP. When the value of this object is null it means that the SAP uses individual ingress QoS queues, instead of the shared ones.
